 2022-10412022-09-29,  ,  ,  CH, 
ActMuseums Act
PrecisApproval of the reappointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of MARK L. BERLIN of Ottawa, Ontario, as a trustee of the Board of Trustees of the Canadian Museum for Human Rights, to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years.
